p: The selected fungal strain ( P. polonicum ARS20) was characterized by the molecular technique of ITS as the perfect tool for identification. This technique compares the sequence that codes for the 18S rRNA gene after PCR amplification. From the Blast analysis, the strain ARS20 displayed high similarity with the formerly identified P. polonicum on the GenBank-constructed phylogenetic tree of the RS20 isolate ( Figure 6). This is in line with previous morphological identifications. The GenBank accession number of the present fungal strain P. polonicum ARS20 is MW041259.
